    • Method Detail

      • displayDialog

        public static AlertDialog displayDialog(Context context,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Purpose - Constructs and displays a dialog. Default listener dismiss the dialog.
        Parameters:
        context - Current context from which this method is called
        title - Title of the dialog box
        message - Message of the dialog box
        Returns:
        AlertDialog object is returned so that onClickListener can be specified.

      • closeDialogListener

        public static OnClickListener closeDialogListener()
        Purpose - Default on click listener which dismissed the dialog.
